mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysConttAtchFile Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CONTT_SN , ATCH_FILE_TURN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_URL , ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_CONTT_ATCH_FILE WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONTT_SN = #{conttSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ATCH_FILE_TURN = #{atchFileTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
